title: Day 1081
content:
# Day 1081

![I am really enjoying 3D printing stuff [https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1898172304049287575](https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1898172304049287575)](https://miro.medium.com/1*XFc83BnzrZlHqy2D3Cb34w.png)

It really is going up forever measured in fiat money. So you might want to get some unless you want your purchasing power ripped away.

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*6PcIAIA9rt511VKTi9FPyA.png)

Not much else to say. Grateful. So grateful to be alive during Bitcoin's monetization phase.

3/7/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
